title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight - Douglas DC6
description:
In this video we will look at the  Douglas DC6 which has been released yesterday by PMDG. The aircraft is something totally different to fly with when used to for example a A320 or 787 but it definitely is a very cool experience. We will do a quick overview in this video after which we take off and go airborne. Keep an eye on my channel for new how to's specifically for this aircraft because I will definitely will create some.  

If you also want to give the aircraft a try you can download it from the site below:
https://pmdg.com/pmdg-dc-6-for-msfs/
